title: Club with website now recruiting players with major swag!
body:
{{item:3930}} **_UPDATE_**: Club is currently at 29 members! Our website is live at majorswag.shivtr.com for all members and RP give-aways start next week! Put a comment on this thread and add me in-game for your invite to Major Swag :)

{{champion:45}} **WHAT IS MAJOR SWAG?** We're a newly founded club with no alternate agenda than to have epic swag! No pre-requisite rank or commitment, only condition is that you're down for a bit of fun and don't take this as any more than it is - a club to get together and chill in, meet some OCE players, get some games happening! RP give-aways and competitions are a GO for members that sign up to our website and introduce themself on the forums!

{{item:2051}} **WHY SHOULD I JOIN?** If the RP give-aways weren't enough, because you want to have fun, duh? We also host our own Teamspeak3 server and club website, where you can be a part of the Major Swag community outside of the client chat box.

{{summoner:30}} **NICE! WHAT ELSE? **Major Swag currently taking all applicants, currently at _29_ members. There is no recruitment process aside from contacting me and getting yourself a sweet, sweet invite, so what are you waiting for?

{{champion:17}}** I NEED MORE! **You thirsty animal! Don't fear, because Major Swag will soon host it's own forum event 'Kill Or Be Killed - Teemo Edition'. You might even become the dreaded Teemo yourself?! Take a walk on the wild side...

See you there, you pimp devils, you.

replies.body: I love git'n wit tha boyz for the looten' and killin' ..... uumm i meanz the fun'z stuff
I'd be happy to join your club, my name has lots of swag in it and I'm down for FUN!
That name has more swag than a bowl of swaghetti yolonaise for breakfast.
Could I get an invite already added you in game. My IGN is Guntera.
keeen hahaha that event sounded fun cause it has teemo in it
Bru ill send ya an invite let me join lmao
sound nice... can i join? ign LegionXI
Add me on League and I can add you to the club :)
This club sounds swag. Sign me up!

Would love to join!

Added you :)
I see that swagman still likes his yabbies {{item:2051}}
All you gotta do is add some swag to your main line and the yabbies come flocking bro.

Is it full yet?
I would like to join
In game name is 98kingkong

Hi, this looks fun, I'd like to join this. my IGN is aivimunky add me in game

EDIT: i just add you
I sent a friend request, invite please?
I think you need to be friends in game to add people to club right now, so anyone interest I'll throw you a request and we can get rolling!
